verse: नास्माकं क्षणमात्रमध्यवसर: कृण्णार्चनं कुर्वताम्‌ । मुक्तिर्द्वारि चतुर्विधाऽधापि किमियं दास्याय लोलायते॥
meaning: For us, just a moment's opportunity to perform the worship of Lord Krishna can bring about liberation at the door in four different ways. What to speak of this, even the servant eagerly desires it.
